content.rendered:
DOUBLE COIN/WYNSTAR TIRE TRUCK TIRE EXPORTED BY FUJIAN HI-BATT INDUSTRIAL CO.,LTD

 

Shuangqian Tyre Group Co., Ltd. is a large enterprise that produced tyres early in China. The Group has four production bases, namely, Shuangqian Group (Jiangsu) Tyre Co Ltd, Shuangqian Group (Chongqing) Tyre Co Ltd, Shuangqian Group (Anhui) Hui Li Tyre Co Ltd and Shuangqian Group (Xinjiang) Kunlun Tyre Co Ltd. The main products of the Group include all-wire radial tyres for heavy vehicles, all-wire radial tyres for light vehicles, all-wire radial tyres for engineering, all-wire radial tyres for industry, bias tyres for heavy vehicles, bias tyres for light trucks, radial tyres for agriculture and radial tyres for cars, etc. The quality of the products is stable and reliable, and they are widely appreciated by Chinese and foreign customers. The Group has been certified by international authorities such as the US Department of Transportation (DOT), the Economic Commission for Europe (ECE), the Indonesian SNI, the Gulf GCC, the Saudi SASO, the Malaysian SIRIM, etc. In China, the Group has passed the 1S09001 quality system certification, the national compulsory product certification (“CCC” certification), the 1S014001 environmental system certification, the OHSA S180 01 Occupational Health and Safety Management System and IATF16949 System Certification.
